newsitem.title: UK: Alitalia N.Europe cargo GM quits.
newsitem.headline: Alitalia N.Europe cargo GM quits.

text.p: Paul Rodwell, Alitalia's London-based cargo manager for northern Europe, said he had resigned to join handling company the London Cargo Group, a unit of BOC Distribution Services, as commercial director.
"The prospects that come with my new job, which I start in January, are exciting and I felt it was an offer I could not turn down," he told Reuters.
He said that with Alitalia his main area of responsibility, the UK, had experienced "a very good year during which both cargo sales and yields were up substantially".
Prior to joining Alitalia, Rodwell was UK and Ireland cargo manager of Spanish airline Iberia.
